mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.cover, et.name as teacherName, esj.title as subjectLevelOne, ess.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course as ec left outer join edu_course_description as ecd on ec.id = ecd.id left outer join edu_teacher as et on ec.teacher_id = et.id left outer join edu_subject as esj on ec.subject_parent_id=esj.id left outer join edu_subject as ess on ec.subject_id = ess.id where ec.id = #{courseId}

NAME AS teacherName, et.intro, et.avatar, esj.id AS subjectLevelOneId, esj.title AS subjectLevelOne, ess.id AS subjectLevelTwoId, ess.title AS subjectLevelTwo FROM edu_course AS ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description AS ecd ON ec.id = ecd.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher AS et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject AS esj ON ec.subject_parent_id = esj.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject AS ess ON ec.subject_id = ess.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
